content.detailedDescription: I must have been about 5-7 years old when i witnessed this. it was around noon, my mother was in the garden and i was walking toward the street when this object emerged from the side of our home. it was moving slowly, approximately 20 mph, i would say about 10 feet above the ground. it made no sound. i was astonished and watched it moving along the road. i saw it from about 5-10 yards when it passed me. i remember asking my mother if she saw it but she was busy with her work in the garden. i watched it fly over the street for about 100-200 yards. then, it turned left and flew over a meadow, behind a line of houses and i lost it from my sight. i was a kid, i though it was a toy kids from the other street were playing with. it was grey, no windows, about 3-5 feet long and about 10-20 inches wide. i found similar objects on the internet. a cigar shape, narrowing toward the enyds. the one i saw had no widows though, no lights, no sound, just a grey object. i know the exact location where it happened. it's a village. a few years ago i heard on the radio there were some sightings reported by polish air force pilots over the baltic sea around that time.
content.summary: A cigar like object about 3-5 feet long moving silently about 5 yards above the ground in fron of me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside playing with my son on the back deck.  the sky was clear.  i saw a jet fly by.  it left behind a jet stream that appeared very close.  with the sky the way it was and the jet stream looking so cool i decided to snap a picture.  i noticed in the picture there was a white dot.  my first thought was that it was a reflection from the sun.  i took a slow motion video immediately after and noticed the object was moving.  it moved like a fly would but looked nothing like an insect.  it came out from the tree line and returned to the same spot.  i also noticed that in the video the ball seems to be in front of the trees which are only a few hundred feet away.  i decided to take more pictures and captured the object a few more times in the sky.  also noticing another jet further in the distance. there were also some pictures that the object did not appear in.  after about 5-10 minutes the two jets and the object were gone.  i have taken pictures from the same location two days in a row and no object appeared, however the sky was much more clear the day i got it.  also i could not see the object with my naked eye.  i could only pick it up on my iphone camera.   at first i wasn't feeling like it was anything but after looking at the pictures and video several times i just can't think of what it could be.  it's never happened to me before.  i am not sure what the object is but i would love to find out. if you need anymore info. you can contact me anytime.
thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Took a pic of the jet stream and caught a small white dot.  then took a video and caught the dot moving.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This is my 4th or 5th ufo sighting. i have doubts on my 4th sighting (65228). but this one is 100% extraterrestrial craft.

date: 24-apr-2015
time: 19:32 (india time)
my location spot (as per google maps): 28.6529163,77.1673835
place: block 24, west patel nagar, new delhi, india
weather: the sky was hazy blue and was still bright at the time of the sighting.
sunset (delhi time): 18:52 (india time)
moonrise (delhi time): 10:30 (india time)
moonset (delhi time): 00:14 on 25th (india time)

duration of sighting:
1st view: about 4 seconds
2nd view: about less than 2 seconds
it's approximate flight path was:
-- from: inbetween west & west-by-south
-- to" inbetween east & east-by-north

i entered an approx. 15 feet wide bylane and habitually kept looking up every now and then (that's how i walk all the time). a few moments later, at 19:32 hours, and at about 65º elevation, i saw a star-like white light moving very slowly in the sky - from left to right. unlike my 3rd extraterrestrial craft sighting (65067), this time i could also see its gray colored, rectangular, horizontal-platform type body, with no apparent external features. it looked like a 2d object with the star-like light at the center of its bottom. since its color was a uniform gray, something inbetween white & black, i could not comprehend the height of the craft.

as usual, there was no noise/sound, no wings like an air plane, no blades like a helicopter, no smoke and it left no trail. it was high up in the sky and quite big - proportions were like 6 cm - x - 3.5 cm - and reminded me of a battle tank (without its barrel). it's size could have been similar to or bigger than a basketball court. if i remember correctly, due to too many thoughts in a very short span of time, its front left side appeared chopped off (curved inside).

it's altitude might have been 500 feet or more, but it wasn't very high up in the sky.

it was moving very slowly and it took about 4 seconds to move across the viewable sky from the 15 feet wide bylane, with three to four storied (floors) buildings on either side and went out of sight. i thought of running down the lane to take another look after turning right but decided not to. i continued walking briskly (my normal speed) and reached the spot (about 25 feet wide street - see image) where i thought i might see it again. i saw it again for or one two seconds and then it went out of sight as a tree obstructed the view of its flight path.

though the sun had set 40 minutes before this sighting, the sky was hazy blue and was still bright at the time of the sighting. the ufo depicted in the image tries to show the bottom view. there was no wind and it wasn't very hot at that time.
content.summary: Gray colored, rectangular platform type ufo, no external features, star-like light at the center of its underbelly, which moved very slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
May 2nd 2015 
i was on my way to the kitchen around 7 pm, right beside the balcony
it was star like, bright in red colour. then i realised there was 7 of them
i did not think it was moving, but then the object changed position for a little bit after 3min
i see them moving from west to southwest ascending

at first i really thought it was stars, but i noticed there were no star at that position, it has star like brightness but the colour is red. after i saw it was ascending, i took pictures and gm of our company was also present 

i lost the sight of the object when they seems to ascend above the cloud
content.summary: 7 red star like ufo ascended above cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I was 17 years old in the summer of 1985. i was riding my motorcycle with a friend of mine on rt 18 north through the little pennsylvania town of wampum. we were each on our own bikes. he was traveling in front of me approx. 25-50 yards. it was a sunny clear sky day. it was in the afternoon, approx. 1500. we were starting to descend a small grade and a silver/grey, round, disc shaped object caught my attention and glided at tree top level over the road from east to west, as if slowing to land. i could not believe what i was actually seeing! it was not a quick movement or flight. the duration was long enough for me to get a good enough look at it to know that it was not an airplane or any other craft that i am familiar with. the flight path was between me and my friend in front of me. after the craft was out of sight, i sped up and pulled my buddy over. i asked him if he just saw what i did, and he said no. i stated that i was disappointed because nobody would ever believe me. he did believe me but didn't see it. i did not notice any windows. there was no sound or any lights to be seen. the craft appeared to be approximately 20-30 feet in diameter (it was almost as wide as the two lane road that it was crossing). it had a tapered dome on top approximately 4-5 feet tall. the whole craft appeared to be smooth but not reflective like chrome. there is an old limestone mushroom mine to the west of rt 18 in wampum, pa. this is the same location where i had my sighting. the mine is currently used for public storage. it also houses a  government/military facility. supposedly to store documents. there is a sign stating there is no trespassing at one of the portals and that you can be arrested for being there. it is currently called wampum underground commerce center. http://wampumunderground.Com/. i do not know if that is where the craft was going, but have always believed that it was even to this day. there have been stories over the years of a policeman in the 50's or 60's chasing a ufo on rt 18 in the same area and reporting on it. the mine was built in the late 1800's for the cement industry. it was not open during the 1970's. 
1890s	limestone mined by the crescent cement company.
1970s	limestone mine closed.
1980s	used for growing mushrooms by sno-top mushroom co..
2004	purchased by the underland development corporation.
2007	mines & meadows atv/rv resort opened.
this info was found at http://www.Showcaves.Com/english/usa/misc/minesmeadows.Html
content.summary: Observed flying disc while driving

content.detailedDescription:
All of the class were taken to see the stars around 10:40pm, but about half of the class left 10 minutes later. i stayed with the monitor and some friends, they were pointing and explaining constellations, i was really bored so i sat down on the grass and looked the opposite way. it was then when i noticed a boomerang-like object with a tiny dome and four flashing lights: yellow, blue, white and red. at first, i thought it was a plane, but i had seen planes flying a from a long distance and they did not fly that worryingly fast. i noticed that it suddenly stopped a couple times in the middle of the air for no apparent reason, then it continued it's path. 

it disappeared into the trees, but i didn't see signs of it descending. it came back another 4 times around our area, abruptly stopping and rerouting as if it was looking for something in particular. it also started to fly in circles at one point. i tried to tell my friends, and they saw it too but they did not seem to pay much attention.

i have seen planes and jets flying at all sorts of distances and i repeat - this object was much faster than the usual. i tried to record and take pictures, but the sky was way too dark and the phone camera wouldn't catch what i saw. i know it sounds stupid and crazy without any evidence but it was not normal at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: School trip. we went to see the stars, i was the first one noticing

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting around my pool with a friend that also witnessed the ufo.

i had been watching the tomcats flying over.  this is an unusual event.

at first i thought shooting star until it stopped suddenly for one to two seconds than flew off fast to the west.

i was cigar shaped and was a bright white.

i looked at my friend and asked him if he saw it, he said yes and he said that was not a shooting star.  i said no way it stopped and started.

i felt intrigued and assumed it had some connection with the jets

it disappeared into clouds
content.summary: Watched ten different tomcat fighters in pairs of two just prior to seen ufo

content.detailedDescription: Over at friends for the evening when one of them pointed out a xmas tree in the sky over the gulf. when she called me over to look, it did look like a lit up tree, triangle about the size of a pea. appeared stationary possibly moving away slowly. flashing red, blue, yellow and green like led lights. at first i thought chinese lantern, but never saw one that had multi colored lights. we both tried to capture it on cell video, mine just shows a yellow light with one of the smaller orbs. while we were filming smaller orbs (3) appeared and seems to circle the main lights. i went and grabbed binoculars (10x50 power)and you could definitely make out the triangle shape. at times it appeared to change over to circular, but think that was due to the pulsating lights. the smaller orbs had no definition through the binoculars. we all agreed triangle after looking at it. after about 20 minutes, while main object stayed visible, orbs blinked out. we went back to what we were doing, then after about another 10 minutes, i went to look again and the main triangle definitely moved out to sea as it was much smaller. i looked due west and there was another set of lights, same coloration but smaller. we first noticed the object around 9:30 pm and stopped watching around 10:pm. a total of 4 of us looked at it and we all agreed that it was just really weird.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multi colored triangle with 3 smaller orbs

content.detailedDescription:
this object was about the size of a "shot put" ball. the sighting took place behind my army units hq building around 10am. on this day i was outside in the motor pool area by myself just taking a small break. as i was looking around i noticed to my right an object that at first glance seemed to be a humming bird due to the fact it was just hovering above the top of the vehicles. i didn't give it a second thought, ive seen plenty of humming birds growing up.  however when i glanced back in that direction, i noticed the "humming bird" body structure i was accustomed to seeing was not present. also the "humming bird" sound from the wings wasn't present either.  
  instead it was a round shot put ball sized dull metallic object. this object hovered for maybe 5 to 6 min or less with no sound and seemed to fade in and out of view as "it" realized i was on to it. the object moved side to side with no sound and as i moved closer to get a closer look it darted toward  the front gate and just faded and disappeared. after this encounter, i immediately went  back into the building  and grabbed my section sargent.

 i was the only person who was outside during this and explained to my sargent what had just happen. i'm really not sure why i didn't go grab her at first, i guess i was just amazed at what i was seeing and at the same time in a state of disbelief. i had no sense of fear or anxiety associated with this event. just a feeling of how cool this was and i needed to tell someone quick!
content.summary: Metallic ball shaped object with no sound. object hovering then disappered

content.detailedDescription: I was out side and looking up. i seen this shape of a triangle. it was orange looking in all 3 corners. the next thing i seen was all 3 split up from each other. one went north one went east and one went south. they noved real fast. i was just looking up into the sky at the star's. i didn't feel any different but was just like always feeling that i thought that are government was trying to scare people again.
content.summary: It was in hovering mode then took off real fast.::

content.detailedDescription:
This evening i was outside smoking my last cigarette of the night before bed.  i tend to walk out on my porch and gaze at the stars.  i suddenly observed a flash of bright white light between the crane and indian stars.  i called my partner over to look because i knew what i had seen was a bit odd.  we both looked up at the sky for a few seconds and then saw the flash again in the same location as the last.  i began to calculate the seconds inbetween flashes and counted 13.  we saw another flash which seemed to move toward the s from the se about a half of an inch.  13 seconds and we witnessed a flash again, but this time there were three lights in a tight triangle formation.  once again 13 seconds and a single flash, still moving about a half of an inch each flash.  next was two flashes at once, 13 seconds and a single flash to finish up.  suddenly we did not witness anymore flashes or strange activity.  the pattern is interesting to me...I know the above may be confussing so the pattern was 1 flash 13 sec black, 1 flash 13 sec, 1 flash 13sec, 3 flashing lights at the sametime-13 sec, 1 flash 13sec, 2 flashes at the sametime-13 sec, and finally 1 flash.
pattern is 1-1-1-3-1-2-1 with 13 second intervals inbetween them.
content.summary: Witness and i observed a sequential light pattern in the sky that went from stationary to moving

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front porch of the house, sitting on the stairs. it was a clear night, not a cloud in the sky.  i was looking up at the stars, just gazing when i noticed an object moving from the south.  it'd didn't have a sound, so i knew it wasn't a helicopter, nor did it have blinking lights like a plane.  also, from the height it was, it appeared to be adjusting speeds to much to be any plane i know of.  it was a round object, and from the distance, appeared small in overall size.  it didn't have a tail, no wings, no cloud like stream like you would see from a jet. nothing i had ever seen before. i continued to just sit there, on the stairs, just watching it; wondering what it was. after a couple seconds or so, it just stopped in mid air, and hovered.  the object then suddenly came west for about 3 seconds or so, moving slowly, the just stopped again.  i was amazed bye what i was seeing.  here i am, a skeptic at the time, and seeing this; i was left speechless.   i hate to use this analogy, but it was like a car crash, i just couldn't look away.  the object then moves north for a few seconds, and then just hovers again.  after a few more seconds of hovering, it (well bye this time, i'm assuming they [referring to the pilot\s]) moves east very quickly this time.  then after a few more seconds of havering, it starts rising slowly, and abruptly shoots off into the sky.  i have never seen anything like it in my life.  the ext day, there were military helicopters flying over our property.  this of course is nothing new to me, because i had seen them fly over our area my entire life.  however, it would be 1 or 2 times every once in a while.  a formation every now and then.  but what struck me as odd was that they flew the majority of the day, and not one flight was a single air craft.  looked like smaller helicopters, plus a couple chinooks, and an attack helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft flew in a straight line, with multiple sharp trajectory changes.  hovering before each change in it's path.

content.detailedDescription: I went to a friends house and as i was driving back home i was going northbound on 29th street in mcallen texas and as i was driving back i looked up about 60 degrees from my car front windshield and i saw a bright object with a star like feature at about 9:45 pm. the object maneuvered smooth and swiftly and descended going into a parabola motion and suddenly disappeared. as a result of that sight i felt excited and shocked thus had to concentrate on not getting into an accident.
content.summary: Driving north bound on street ans saw bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Observed star-like object in n/ne sky starting at approximately 22:00 from home.Object stationery for long periods,remarkable because of changing colors on perimeter of orb and stationery position.Colors change quite rapidly through a variety of colors. orb did move slightly at one point around 23:00.As of 23:30 object is still visible. this object was observed in bristol,tn on 05/09/2015.
content.summary: Star-like object changing border colors observed stationery for >30min.

content.detailedDescription: After stepping outside my vehicle, i glanced toward the lights of an aircraft (i'm a pilot and aerospace engineer who works on the development of general aviation aircraft so i typically will look at aircraft when seen). my sister is with me as well after we came home from a late dinner and we both have good vision. i saw two dim lights then appear near the aircraft, not implying they originated from the aircraft but in the same area which caused them to also catch my eye. the two lights about half the intensity of jupiter were moving rapidly from the north and became seperated but flying in parallel. the distance they were apart and the speed at which they were approachig first made me believe they were a low flying aircraft seperate from the original i saw. however, there was no sound associated with them. they were also slightly yellow and not red and green like aircraft nav lights and there were no strobes or red beacon lights. the light intensity of them was constant. only a second or so after seeing them i said to my sister what is that? look? she looked where i was pointing and they caught her eye as well as she verbally affirmed. as they approached quickly they went from flying in perfect parallel as it seemed and started to move closer eachother, dancing and overlapping but continuing in a quick north to south direction. it was difficult to tell their altitude at this point and would estimate between 3000' and 10000'. any altitude theirin would make them too quick to make a sonic boom based on being at various airshows and my professional judgement. when they started dancing together weaving in and out crossing eachothers path seemingly we both expressed our confusion at what they could be. my sisters husband who was also with us did not see them which is disappoiting but understandable due to their speed moving from where we were pointing and the distraction of other stars and that aircraft in the original vacinity. the lightings continued to dance together intellegently yet their speed and the rate at which they changed direction does not resemble any technology i have seen (especially that which wouldnt make noise such as missiles). it is possible their altitude was so high that sound did not reach us. however their paths do not make any sense for high altitude missiles nor their speed. the higher their possible altitude the more unnatural their speed would be. my sisters first thought was some sort of organism like a firefly but they were not flashing and she has never seen fireflies in her area. we looked around for others but did not find any. the fact they initially were flying parallel to eachother rules out fireflies as well. we lost view of the objects as they passed over the roof of a house maybe 20-25 degrees above the horizon. as they moved south their paths appeared closer to eachother (but still 'dancing') indicating to me their distance from us significantly increased during the 10 or less seconds from the time that we saw them to the north. the sighting made me confused. ive never not been able to explain something i've seen, especially in the sky. there were no reported rocket launches and i have seen many living in florida from cape canavaral both day and night. this was unlike any predictable trajectory a lunch to space would take. i am utterly confused at the moment which has caused me to make this post.
content.summary: After aircraft braught attention to sky, two fairly dim lights quickly moving in parallel tracked from north to south then began 'dancing' wi/each other as they moved overhead & continued doing so until fading out of view at 20-25 degree inclination.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were watching an episode of "the universe ancient mysteries solved."  the episode title was "apocalyptic visions."  it was on the history channel.  about 3 to 4 minutes into the program a small white object appeared behind the narrator.  it was moving "stage left" (our right).  the object was barely visible but it caught our eyes just enough that we went back and watched it several times.  it was white and moved too rapidly to be an airplane or helicopter.  it was traveling almost horizontally, descending slightly.  the scene was shot at a place we are familiar with called "vasquez rocks."  the object disappeared behind the rock formation.  vasquez rocks are in agua dulce, ca 91350.
our immediate feeling were that is was not a normal aircraft.
content.summary: Object was observed on a tv show background.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to take dogs out, looked up at a jet trail and saw this object fly extremely fast then kite (hover)
content.summary: Triangle object moved at high speed, then stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window, and i saw a jet. so i took out a pair of binoculars (i've just bought them and wanted to use them). so after my fair share of jet watching i lowered them. and i saw something floating. it was a long narrow cigar shaped aircraft. no sharp edges, and no wings. it left no trail behind it. it was moving from south-east to south in direction at a fairly fast speed. so i ran outside, and in that time it had moved much faster than a blimp, so that was ruled out. i was watching it through my binoculars. it had no windows, and it was stopped in mid air. all of a sudden it just vanished. i just spent 10 minutes scanning the area with no success of finding it.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped ufo. no edges, all rounded. no windows, wings, or trails behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I worked as a stationary engineer for a high raise office building .I was  checking cooling towers at the time .That day also i had checked them around 12 noon .I had notice a amber light that went by me so fast .But did not think anything of it .This was during day light hours .That eveing i went back to the roof for another check of cooling fans .It was dark at this time say around 7 pm .As i looked south there were 7 starlight amber shape moving at a high rate of speed behine each orher   as they went over they jump into a v formation heading north . i did not want to say anything about this because i was employed .I did not want them to think i was crazy .Sorry that it took this much time to report this . stange amber lights , i felt like i had witness somthing very strange .Lost sight of them going north over lake erie .
content.summary: Standing on a roof thats 350ft high office building notice 7 amber lights that went over and then as i looked north they jump into a v formation

content.detailedDescription: Ok so i thought i would share this simply so at least someone is aware! in brief i asked to see a ufo in my head and right on cue guess what?..A ufo!  a while back i started to become more intrigued by the universe as you do etc etc so my plan was to get a telescope and do a bit more research. i was in my garden looking at the sky imagining what im going to see with my telescope and pretty much said too myself in my head if i could see a ufo just now that it would be so unbelievable and if it was actaully real then show me!..Then almost immediately an orange ball i would assume was quite a distance away shot from my left hand view (e) to my central view (s). it hovered for maybe a few seconds there and travelled out my sight in front off me until i couldnt see it(s). thats my story!! just to add this may or may not be relevant but i gave up smoking probably not that long after the sighting(not because off it lol) and had a very very strange dream. i link the smoking too this as it seemingly is a cause of weird dreams when giving up. it pretty much consisted of me again standing in my garden looking to the sky but seeing all the stages off the universe happening. i already knew this was the case in my dream for whatever reason to clarify. it went on until the big bang where i definetely got a fright and woke up. all i can remember before the big bang and i woke was one of the stages was a square almost glass transparent universe consisting of stars. there was also an equation appeared in one of the stages and i wish for the life of me i could remember but i think there was an h and 2 in it!! anyway thats it so make of it as you will. cheers [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Simply a very strange "coincidental" spooky occurance

content.detailedDescription: Several lights... not looking like planes...
content.summary: Very strange... couldn't believe what i was seeing.. please forgive my language.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i live in niagara falls, and we went to play with a new d5200 camera.  i was taking photos away from the falls through the mist, on long exposures, and out of a a large number of photos, this one stood out.

i have no idea what it is.  i don't know if it's a camera shake, i don't know if it's a funny glare that happened during an exposure so i was hoping maybe someone there could identify it as well as let me know what it is.  

i did not notice anything in the original raw files until i started tweaking the photo and noticed it.  i have three photos that this object is in, and in different places.

time taken was between roughly between 9:30 and 10:30pm

i am including a jpeg of the original raw photo as well as a close up, ovr exposed photo that shows the object more clearly.

again, i don't know if this is a lens flair or a funny shake.. but it's kinda creepin me out.

any reply would be appreciated
content.summary: Saw nothing until i started tweaking photos

content.detailedDescription: I live in staten island, ny and i had my girlfriend visiting so i had to give her a ride home to brooklyn, ny (a route traveled many times). for the majority of the journey i travel along the main highway "west shore expressway" which goes, for the most part, from the tip of the south shore to the bridge at the tip of the north shore. as we were driving i was pointing out the old landfill to my girlfriend when i spotted a very bright red orb in the distance. i immediatly knew that this was not a light from a plane because it was so bright that it illuminated the clouds around it and was also solid and not blinking like a plane light would be. i focused my attention as much as i could while i was driving but was still able to keep it in sight for a long amount of time. as i pointed out this light to my girlfriend all of a sudden the lights on what appeared to be a military style dual rotor helicopter just appeared a short distance ahead of the orb. the fact that the light just appeared and not flew into view peaked my interest when all of a sudden the exact same thing happened with a 2nd identical copter appearing a short distance behind the orb. i watched all 3 objects in the air and noticed that the 2 "copters" lights would extinguish then reappear in a different area the very next moment. the odd thing was that as the copters would do this teleporting dance the red orb would always be between them. i had my girlfriend take out her phone and record what i was seeing but i dont know if she did not aim it in the exact spot or that the street and car lights just made it difficult to capture the lights but i am attaching the few minutes of video in hopes that maybe you could be able to zoom in or filter it to isolate the lights i seen. throughout the video you can hear me describe what i am seeing but since i was the one driving i could not record the video myself safely.
content.summary: Red glowing orb appears then 2 military dual rotor helicoptors start to teleport locations always with red orb between them

content.detailedDescription:
On may 8 2015,walking my dog north of my home in sunshine valley nm

i saw a large flying object silver and cooper in color,and made up of two triangles shapes.The silver part making up 2/3 of the overall length.The silver part was very bright and shinny,and i could not see any details to surface of the object.The object was coming out of the west over the rio grande gorge headed east approaching ute mountain.As it got closer to the mountain i noticed it made no sound,and it seemed to be moving to slow for something that size,more than a hundred feet. and at that point i could tell it did not have wings.I was in air force and my father was a pilot,so i feel i know a little about aircraft,and this was something i had never seen before.When this object got directly over the top of ute mountain,it disappeared in less an a second.It did not fly behind the mountain or fly out of sight,it disappeared.I don't have pictures or a video for you i wish i did.I am not real sure how i feel about seeing it.I hope in my live time we have the answers.
content.summary: Saw a large flying object ,fly to the top of ute mountain and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was diving south on fort apache road south of warm springs road in las vegas and it was a partially cloudy morning.  i noticed in my vision above the horizon to the se what i thought was a very white cloud or a short contrail until i started looking and noticed it had sharp edges and was possibly silver and reflecting light making it appear white.  it appeared mostly stationary.  if it was moving it was moving to the east at a very slow speed.  i looked at it for 10-15 seconds while sill attempting to pay attention to the road and decided that it was not ordinary.  it was either cigar shaped or the side of a disc shaped object making it appear flat.  it was about the size you would see a pill if you were to hold it out at arms length.  i decided to get it on film.  i focused on the road for a second while grabbing my phone and when i looked back up it was gone.
content.summary: Observed a flat white or silver object while driving for 10-15 seconds, looked at the road, then looked back and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: In the early summer of 97 or 98 i was 11 or 12 and the river by my house was low and my cuzins had drove ther atvs across to come see us. there used to be an old wooden bridge across it to connect tichnor to point daluce but it had washed out during a flood and was never rebuilt.  an atv could cross where the bridge was. the stayed the afternoon and had supper with us. me and my mother fallowed them in our van to make sure they was able to get back across the river. we see them safely across the river and are coming home i look out the window after i catch a bright light out of the corner of my eye. i see this giant ball like object in the western sky. it was wide stripped with warm colors redish orange and yellow orangeish. there was 2  bright dark red ovals that was about 2/3s the way down. i looked at my mother and before i could see say it she asked me. do you see that! scared i looked farward and said no. i glanced backnout the window to see it zoom of in a south by south west direction. for the longest i wouldn't even talk about it. i spent years trying to forget it and after i had convenced myself it was a dream. about 4 years ago a friend of the family brought it up. i now realize wat i saw was a ufo and it was no dream. i remember it like it was yesterday. thery was no additional sitings of and military present around that time. but i have seen transport helicopters, helicopters in general  flying high throughout my life  in my area. i hvae seen a f16  abiut 2 tree tops high fly right over me biut 1/2 mile south of my house. i feel this needs to be reported to try and find out just exactly wat i saw. i believe i saw a ufo.
content.summary: Giant striped ball with atlest 2 bright dark red circles on it

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday night around 3am i always go to my balcony to smoke a ciggerate and look up to the skies and look at the amazing stars at night much peaceful.But as i was looking at a star the shinning flashing object was blinking to fast that i know it couldn't be a star.So as i'm looking it changed colors so as im still looking it made a sharp up down like you make a line on a peace of paper next thing you know it disappeared in a blink of an eye... it was real strange but before that i seen the same thing weeks before. and it always seems to be in the same location then takes off when it wants too. always around 3am something strange happens in the night clear skies.
content.summary: I was on my balcony smoking a ciggerate and notice something just shining by a star next thing you know its flashing blinking so fast that it started to drift away then lights then it took off like a blink of an eye. i know i'm not crazy what i seen

content.detailedDescription: For a few years, i have seen objects in the night sky that are strange looking and move around. i kept seeing these objects, so i have been taking photos of objects seen from my back yard with a camera with a zoom lens.  i would like someone to look at these photos (and a few video's) of these objects and tell me what they are.
content.summary: I am have been seeing strange objects in the sky when observing the sky in my back yard, so i started to take photos of these objects.

content.detailedDescription: It was somewhat 1 am, i woke up and went to drink water, shortly after my return when i went to bed i heard a strange roaring sound "trrrrrrr" like someone poked in a plastic strip into a pedestal fan. i ignored it and tried to sleep. in my dream i saw a strange levitating object just outside my window. it was black and it was somewhat between conical and triangular, it had lights at its edge in a sequence of white, golden and then a strange color(something between orange, blue and green i guess). i was alone in the room but i felt as if someone held my body, i couldn't move my body except my eyes. i saw something white come out, i felt it was alive, it was white and uneven shaped like an amoeba, it passed through the iron net of the window and came to me, it projected its body toward my head. meanwhile the sound of the object outside my window was already deafening loud. as soon as i felt its warm body part touch my forehead i woke up. this was strange. i still heard the sound but it was faint. i felt i could move, i rushed to the window and saw that object. it was somewhat 8-9 feet far from me (with the wall in between), it slowly went up and got out of my sight. it took it about a minute to totally go high enough so that i could not see it due to the upper end of the window pane. till then i reached for my phone to take a picture of that thing but the screen seemed to be glitched when i turned it on, it flickered and went off. i realized that the fan and the ac was also off. after it went away i looked at the clock, it was stuck on 3:34. after a few minutes, all my appliances started working altogether. next day upon asking in my locality, no one was found to have witnessed anything, but to confirm, i found the corner branches of a tree near my house burnt from the tip while still intact with the tree.
content.summary: Flying object outside my window with strange creature, caused me temporary confusion and lost track of time.

content.detailedDescription: On christmas eve i was at my ex father in law's house in rural farmland of ilmajoki watching lights over the direction of seinäjoki from the upstairs bedroom window. i decided to go outside to take a better look at what i was seeing. it was a cold night with snow on the ground. as i was viewing the lights i looked up at the clouds above the house and saw a vortex, a circle with the clouds churning inward with a hole in the middle up towards the heavens above. i have never seen an anomaly like this before or since. it continued for well over 90 minutes plus until i could not take the -20c any longer. i am reporting this only because of your recent program concerning sky people and it is something that has been bothering me for some time. what did i see and how does it contribute to your investigations?
content.summary: Vortex in the clouds above where i was staying.
